description:
Description : #1, Blue Chip Device Manufacturer is creating a new specialty division. They are recruiting for experienced device sales managers for key major US locations.

This is an exclusive division within the company. Compensation is over 250k at plan. Your exciting job will be to hire and train new reps.

Please only apply if you meet the following criteria.Qualifications :

Currently calling on surgeons.* Cardiovascular, Vascular OR Interventional Radiologist contact points a plus but not required.
• No more than 2 jobs in last 5yrs.* Background at companies such as J&J, Boston Scientific, US surgical etc.PLEASE DO NOT APPLY TO THIS POSITION IF YOU DO NOT MEET EVERY ONE OF THESE REQUIREMENTS .

Last updated : 2024-03-08
